Welcome to
Maple's Restaurant.

Pancakes are our
obsession.

There's nothing like some fluffy, warm pancakes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

We're open from dawn 'til dusk, so come on in and grab a pancake stacked with fresh fruit, Nutella choc, and our signature Maple Special Syrup.
